body.p: This is an EPUB test document. It includes many things designed to exercise various features of the DITA for Publishers EPUB transformation type.

section.title: Font Embedding
section.p:
To test font embedding, specify the following runtime options:
epub.font.manifest Point it to to the fonts/font-manifest.xml file under the root epub-test directory. For OxygenXML you can do this as ${cfd}/fonts/font-manifest.xml. This manifest points to the AlexBrush-Regular.ttf font in the fonts directory and indicates that it should be obfuscated.
epub.obfuscate.fonts Set to "true" to turn font obfuscation. Fonts will not be obfuscated unless this property is set to true. (This lets you generate EPUBs without obfuscated fonts even when the font manifest specifies obfuscated fonts.
args.css Set to the css/epub-test.css under the root epub-test directory. For OxygenXML you can do ${cfd}/css/epub-test.css. The CSS defines the AlexBrush-Regular.ttf font and uses it for h1, h2, and h3 elements. It also sets the color for those elements to teal so you can easily tell if the CSS is being applied.
